Burin Amornpaisannon

Ph.D. Student

Burin is a second year Ph.D. student at the National University of Singapore. He is pursuing his Ph.D. under the supervision of Dr. Trevor E. Carlson and Dr. Li-Shiuan Peh. His research interests include understanding physical attack vectors, efficient neuromorphic computing and computer architecture in general.
